name: IZARIS
description:
We are a Mexican company located in Santiago de Querétaro, Qro. We effectively provide computer solutions to the industry and companies Queretanas, Bajío and Rest of the Country.
We focus on meeting the needs of MSMEs through competitive, flexible solutions that expand markets, position their brand, generate economic savings and, more importantly, increase sales. It is a goal for us, to offer these advantages and to gain your entire confidence , since more than a supplier, we want to be an ally in its growth .
